You can't let that one thing get you down. That's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. Richard Rip Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson . led Mayor Tom Leppert to ask for a city review of how council members hand out ceremonial gifts. "We don't condone it and clearly didn't approve it," Mayor Tom Leppert said of the Michael Vick award. It's unfortunate, and I would rather have not seen the situation. The key Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick was less than official, city officials explained. The official Dallas "keys" are made from gold or crystal and given out mostly to foreign dignitaries under strict protocol.

people. Remember when Sen. Bernie Sanders John Boehner promised a 100 Billion in spending cuts just in the first year if they won in Nov. 2010. Let us decide. http://wn.com/Gen_Collin_Powell_Has_Some_Advice_For_President_Obama Colin Powell was on "Meet the Press" last week, where he talked about all of the things Barack Obama has touted and been involved in for the last two years. Colin Powell said, the Barack Obama also has to, I think, shift the way in which he has been doing things. I think the American people feel that too many programs have come down.
